message.en:
Hi üëã, it's Anton, creator of this app. 

 Since this update hopefully all future updates will be explained throught these short dialogs. 

 And when you will have any idea üóí or noticed a bug üêõ please don't hesitate to contact me in Discord (Arenukvern) (see button at the left bottom corner) or send email üì¨ to idea@xsoulspace.dev - this info always available in information ("i" button on the top of screen)

- new: when you edit idea or note it will pops up(down) in list, direction is dependant from settings 
- new: change projects direction switch - you can choose how projects will be aligned in list from bottom to top or from top to bottom 

- imporved: new icon background 
- imporved: more good looking layout for settings
- imporved: more stability in all scrolling
- imporved: now desktop versions has no back button when it is no need in it 

- fixed: scrollbars offset for desktop versions 

 Have a nice day and week! 
 Anton
